mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Member(id, nickName, password, email, address) VALUES (#{id}, #{nickName}, #{password}, #{email}, #{address})
mapper.update: UPDATE Member SET nickName = #{nickName}, password = #{password}, email = #{email}, address = #{address} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT m.id, m.nickName, m.password, m.email, m.address, m.inserted, COUNT(b.id) AS numberOfBoard FROM Member m LEFT JOIN Board b ON m.id = b.writer GROUP BY m.id ORDER BY inserted DESC;
